fast_foods.name: Big Mac
fast_foods.short_description: Iconic double-decker burger with special sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickles, and onions on a sesame seed bun.

fast_foods.name: Spicy Chicken Sandwich
fast_foods.short_description: Crispy breaded chicken breast filet with spicy seasoning, mayo, and pickles on a toasted bun.

fast_foods.name: Fish Tacos
fast_foods.short_description: Battered fish strips with cabbage slaw, lime crema, and pico de gallo in soft corn tortillas.

fast_foods.name: Double Cheeseburger
fast_foods.short_description: Two beef patties with melted American cheese, pickles, onions, and condiments on a plain bun.

fast_foods.name: Chicken Nuggets (10pc)
fast_foods.short_description: Bite-sized pieces of breaded chicken breast served with choice of dipping sauce.

fast_foods.name: Supreme Pizza Slice
fast_foods.short_description: Large slice topped with pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, onions, and mushrooms.

fast_foods.name: Burrito Bowl
fast_foods.short_description: Rice, beans, choice of meat, lettuce, cheese, and fresh salsa in a convenient bowl.

fast_foods.name: Classic Hot Dog
fast_foods.short_description: All-beef hot dog topped with mustard, ketchup, onions, and relish in a soft bun.

fast_foods.name: Chicken Wings (8pc)
fast_foods.short_description: Crispy wings tossed in buffalo sauce, served with celery and ranch dressing.

fast_foods.name: French Fries
fast_foods.short_description: Golden-brown potato fries, perfectly seasoned with salt and served hot and crispy.

fast_foods.name: Veggie Wrap
fast_foods.short_description: Fresh vegetables, hummus, and feta cheese wrapped in a spinach tortilla.

fast_foods.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
fast_foods.short_description: Grilled chicken breast over romaine lettuce with parmesan, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

fast_foods.name: Philly Cheesesteak
fast_foods.short_description: Thinly sliced beef with melted cheese, grilled onions, and peppers on a hoagie roll.

fast_foods.name: Onion Rings
fast_foods.short_description: Thick-cut onions battered and fried until golden, served with dipping sauce.

fast_foods.name: Ice Cream Sundae
fast_foods.short_description: Vanilla soft-serve topped with hot fudge, whipped cream, nuts, and a cherry.
